Proposed Change:
Reformat codelist so that activity and organistion level documents are more clearly defined. 

Depreciate the `Document Category (category) <https://iatistandard.org/en/iati-standard/203/codelists/documentcategory-category/>`_ codelist.
Rationale: Currently, A codes are for activity level documents and B codes are for organisation level documents. This is not clear to data users or publishers.
The existing codelist is taken from the DAC/CRS transaction classification. Reporting organisations have become more varied since IATIs inception, and struggle to map to internal codes.
To ensure that data users and publishers have a shared understanding of the codelist.

Proposed Change: Replace the values 1-2 and 2-1 with 12 and 21.
Rationale: Microsoft Excel interprets 1-2 and 2-1 as dates, which makes it hard to work with IATI data that uses this codelist in spreadsheets.
To ensure that data users and publishers have a shared understanding of the codelist.

Proposed Change: Map the codelist to the OECD DAC codes
Rationale: To allow easy mapping between systems.
Source:
Initial `discussions <https://www.iaticonnect.org/discussion/differences-between-ngo-organisation-type-codes>`_  in 2016.
